column1: Little Goat Diner////My daughter ordered the beef ravioli and it might have been the best of the four entrees that we ordered
column2: beating out the Chinese chicken sandwich
column3: the shrimp & pork belly and the duck leg confit. It was the a classic case of the menu reading better than the food tasted. Sadly
column4: it was not a particularly memorable meal (for anything positive
column5: anyway.) I've only eaten there once
column6: so it is fair to guess that it was just a bad night.
